dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool extracts values from a raster layer based on sample (point) locations. Extracted values are put into a new feature table.

Required Inputs:

  • The name of the raster layer from which values will be extracted

  • The file path and name of the output feature table

Output

  • a feature table
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Created by the geneGIS team: Dori Dick, Shaun Walbridge, Scott Baker, Dawn Wright

Consts.useLimit: This script tool was developed to work with ArcGIS 10.1 and Python 2.7 installed during ArcGIS installation.

tool.name: extractRasterByPoints

param.name: Input_Raster
param.dialogReference: The name of the raster layer from which to extract values.

param.name: Output_Feature_Table
param.dialogReference: The name of the output feature table.

tool.summary:
This tool extracts values from a raster layer based on sample (point) locations. Extracted values are put into a new feature table.

Required Inputs:

  • The name of the raster layer from which values will be extracted

  • The file path and name of the output feature table

Output

  • a feature table
tool.usage: Extracts values from a raster layer based on sample locations.
